summary: Identified 3 files with misleading omega-rule/omega-saturation comments: TruthLemma.lean (6 locations), Completeness.lean (1 location), README.md (1 location). The correct explanation is that temporal backward directions require structural properties (temporal_backward_G/H) using MCS maximality by contraposition - the SAME pattern as modal_backward - not omega-saturation. Detailed replacement text provided for all locations.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of misleading omega-rule comments with specific replacement text for all affected files
